channel.title: [Project] Second Semester Project
channel.description:
The second semester for university is on the brink!, i have been asked, with a group to produce a website.
Our idea was to create a website for unknown / underground music, such as DJ's and indie music played at small venues to help get recognized! it would do something like the following: - play music - able to create play lists - download music for a price (at authors discretion) - search for artists based on your taste
our thoughts of what applications included: - AJAX - XML - to store song information - XHTML - CSS2 - uniform styling - Oracle Database (we have access to an oracle database, we could possibly use an SQL database)
my question is, what are your thoughts on the idea? what applications would you use to implement the idea?
anything else you wish to tell me? (apart from good luck :p)

item.title: [Project] Second Semester Project
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

sanga282:

no they are still shit flash should only be used on site if its a flash application ie a game thats it. Banners and shit llike that just fail on sites if it comes from flash

He’s talking about using flash for the music player.

Hmm… Good luck?

If you need any help with layout design/Flash let me know. You should add the ability for the artist to have their own page, like myspace but muchhhh better :D. And you can probably get away with using XHTML and CSS, along with Flash or Java for the player. Oh, and if your still determined to use XML, use it for Flash to load the urls of the music files and playlists.

Read full topic

no they are still shit flash should only be used on site if its a flash application ie a game thats it. Banners and shit llike that just fail on sites if it comes from flash

Would you like a theme designing or do you just want ideas?

i am going to call it UnDrGrNd.fm

The second semester for university is on the brink!, i have been asked, with a group to produce a website.

Our idea was to create a website for unknown / underground music, such as DJ’s and indie music played at small venues to help get recognized!
it would do something like the following:

  • play music
  • able to create play lists
  • download music for a price (at authors discretion)
  • search for artists based on your taste

our thoughts of what applications included:

  • AJAX
  • XML - to store song information
  • XHTML
  • CSS2 - uniform styling
  • Oracle Database (we have access to an oracle database, we could possibly use an SQL database)

my question is, what are your thoughts on the idea?
what applications would you use to implement the idea?

anything else you wish to tell me? (apart from good luck :p)
